document.full_text: u.s. homebuilder sentiment slipped a notch in april as home prices continued to fall in most areas of the country amid widespread foreclosures, a survey released on monday showed.
document.title: homebuilder sentiment slips in april
lines_and_colors: u.s. homebuilder sentiment slipped a notch in april as home prices continued to fall in most areas of the country amid widespread foreclosures, a survey released on monday showed.
